statements: SELECT * FROM supplier_performance_reports;
SELECT supplier_name, report_date FROM supplier_performance_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, lead_time FROM supplier_performance_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(report_id) AS report_count FROM supplier_performance_reports GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING report_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance_reports WHERE lead_time > 5 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, AVG(lead_time) AS avg_lead_time FROM supplier_performance_reports GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING AVG(lead_time) > 10;
SELECT supplier_name, report_date FROM supplier_performance_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC, report_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(report_id) AS num_reports FROM supplier_performance_reports GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING COUNT(report_id) >= 3;
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance_reports WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Corp%' ORDER BY report_id ASC;
SELECT supplier_id, performance_score, lead_time FROM SupplierPerformance;
SELECT performance_score, supplier_id, lead_time FROM SupplierPerformance;
SELECT lead_time, supplier_id, performance_score FROM SupplierPerformance;
SELECT lead_time_description, lead_time_id, lead_time_value FROM LeadTimes;
SELECT lead_time_value, lead_time_description, lead_time_id FROM LeadTimes;
SELECT * FROM SupplierPerformance WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT lead_time_description FROM LeadTimes WHERE lead_time_value > 5 ORDER BY lead_time_id DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, performance_score FROM SupplierPerformance WHERE lead_time > 10 ORDER BY performance_score ASC;
SELECT AVG(performance_score) AS avg_score, MAX(lead_time) AS max_lead_time FROM SupplierPerformance;
SELECT * FROM LeadTimes WHERE lead_time_value BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY lead_time_description ASC;
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance;
SELECT supplier_id, performance_metric FROM supplier_performance WHERE performance_metric = 'Quality';
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM supplier_info ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM supplier_info WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT MAX(lead_time_days) AS max_lead_time FROM supplier_performance;
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance ORDER BY supplier_id DESC, performance_metric ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT supplier_id, performance_metric FROM supplier_performance WHERE lead_time_days > 5
SELECT supplier_id, AVG(lead_time_days) AS avg_lead_time FROM supplier_performance GROUP BY supplier_id
SELECT sp.supplier_id, si.supplier_name, po.order_date FROM supplier_performance sp JOIN supplier_info si ON sp.supplier_id = si.supplier_id JOIN purchase_orders po ON sp.supplier_id = po.supplier_id
SELECT supplier_id, location FROM supplier_info WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers;
SELECT product_name, lead_time FROM products WHERE lead_time > 3;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders WHERE quantity < 100;
SELECT report_id, report_name, report_date FROM reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_location='New York';
SELECT product_name, lead_time FROM products ORDER BY lead_time DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT report_name, report_date, supplier_name FROM reports JOIN suppliers ON reports.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance;
SELECT supplier_name, lead_time FROM supplier_performance ORDER BY lead_time DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, lead_time FROM supplier_performance WHERE lead_time < 5;
SELECT supplier_name, lead_time FROM supplier_performance WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT supplier_name, SUM(lead_time) AS total_lead_time FROM supplier_performance GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT * FROM supplier_performance WHERE lead_time > 5 ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, lead_time FROM supplier_performance WHERE lead_time <= 10 ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, rating FROM supplier_performance AS sp JOIN supplier_ratings AS sr ON sp.id = sr.supplier_id WHERE sr.rating >= 4 ORDER BY supplier_name, rating DESC;
SELECT sc.contact_name, sc.phone_number, sr.rating FROM supplier_contacts AS sc JOIN supplier_ratings AS sr ON sc.supplier_id = sr.supplier_id WHERE sr.rating < 3 ORDER BY sc.contact_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*), MAX(lead_time), MIN(lead_time) FROM supplier_performance;
